segments.text: I can't help but laugh at the boy's determination to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really going for it, even if it means risking a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting so patiently for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she's going to get her cookie soon, and that makes me happy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying that plate like it's the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she's even aware of what's happening around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out of the sink, and she doesn't seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone turns off that faucet soon, before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm and peaceful, it's a nice change from the chaos in here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to make it, he's almost got those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just so funny and chaotic, I can't help but laugh.
segments.speaker: PAR
